description.narrative:
Due to our previous successful Let’s Speak Up program in Jakarta, hence the project needs to be scaled up. So, more YwDSs could speak up and step forward to become self-advocate and make progress in joining advocacy in the cross-disability movement and ensuring that there is no one left behind. The program needs to be scaled up in many more places besides Jakarta, thus YwDSs from another partof the city or regions has the same opportunity to speak up and be empowered as YwDSs who live in a more fortunate place to truly achieve dignity and equity of opportunity.
We would also need to train more human resources by doing internal and external capacity building. For our organization, we will train and educate more human resources for our staff candidate to become a coach and our existing self-advocate to become peer-buddies or class assistants. Our internal capacity building will strengthen their skill and ability to help us in conducting the program. Furthermore, we will implement external capacity building such as training for the teachers, trainers, support person, and parent who live in Jakarta and outside Jakarta.
We are aware of the uncertainty, situation, and condition due to COVID-19 whereas YwDSs are one group that fall to a high-risk group to catch virus include Coronavirus due to their comorbid condition. And that up-to-date Indonesia is still on its first stage, even more the new cases of positive Covid-19 are on therises or getting worse each day. Yet, we are still eager to do the scale-up project and we have decided to conduct an online classas the best option to do so we could scale up the project with different communities but as well from other provinces. By doing theintervention online we could then reach out more participants from places around Indonesia.
